import { useState } from 'react'; export const CreateRecipes = () => { const [recipe, setRecipe] = useState({ name: '', ingredients: [], instructions: '', imageUrl: '', cookingTime: 0, userOwner: 0, }); const handleChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target; setRecipe({...recipe, [name]: value}); } return
